item.title: One Earth Community
item.description:
One Earth Community

In this day where the planet Earth is said to have “shrunk” due to technology, humanity has seemed to adapted to the convergence of different cultures.

item.title: A challenge for Americans to make the right choice...On the one side of the two “major” party’s we have...
item.description:
A challenge for Americans to make the right choice...On the one side of the two “major” party’s we have...

Donald Trump announced Friday that he would pick Indiana Gov. Mike Pence as his running mate. I am pleased to announce that I have chosen Governor Mike Pence as my Vice Presidential running mate. News conference tomorrow at 11:00 A.M.- Donald J.

item.title: Challenge...climate change ? Regardless... the challenge is reforestation.
item.description:
Challenge...climate change ? Regardless... the challenge is reforestation.

The devastation the California drought has caused to conifer trees in the Sierra Nevadas over the last couple of years "is far greater than previously observed," NASA scientists said in announcement of the publication of new map of the region. David Schimel, a senior research scientist who worked...
